tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    room_name VARCHAR(50),
    is_active BOOL,
    energy_consumption DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE routines (
    routine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    routine_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    devices_involved TEXT[] NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices (
   device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   device_name VARCHAR(50),
   device_type VARCHAR(50),
   room_id INT,
   is_smart BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE smart_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    room_id INT,
    power_consumption INT
);

CREATE TABLE routines (
    routine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    routine_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    trigger_device_id INT NOT NULL,
    action_device_id INT NOT NULL,
    time_of_day TIME
);
